events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review your credentials shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department, specifically for the software development role.
A recruiter has been assigned to your case and will contact you soon to discuss the next steps in the hiring process.
We completed your initial screening interview and are impressed with your background and technical skills demonstrated.
Thank you for your prompt response to our interview scheduling request. We appreciate your enthusiasm for the role.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 6th at 2 PM. Please ensure your environment is set up for coding exercises.
You have successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving abilities and software knowledge.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 9th at 3 PM. This will cover company culture, benefits, and your career aspirations.
Your HR interview is complete, and we appreciate your candid responses and interest in our company values.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer position, including competitive salary and benefits.
Thank you for your feedback on the offer. We are glad to hear you find the package attractive and exciting.
Congratulations on accepting our offer! We look forward to welcoming you to the engineering team soon.
Your onboarding process has started. You will receive all necessary information to get settled and productive quickly.
The recruitment case is now closed successfully. The new engineer has been integrated and started contributing to projects.
